item.title: Callbacks in Cplex
item.author: blog@joaojunior.org (Joao Junior)
item.description: Callbacks in Cplex I used LazyConstraintCallback to implement a Branch and Cut algorithm with CPLEX, but when I implemented and run this algorithm, it was very slow if I compare it with its version that doesn’t use callbacks in Cplex. The reason is because ControlCallback(LazyConstraintCallback is a ControlCallback) switch Cplex to sequential mode by default and turn off dynamic search. I wrote this post, because I didn’t find this information in Cplexâ€™s documentation, I only found it in this technical forum.
